# CrosbieLabFunctions

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of CrosbieLabFunctions is to create a host of functions that will be used repetitively in the Crosbie lab

## Installation

You can install the development version of CrosbieLabFunctions from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("pak")
pak::pak("jclutton/CrosbieLabFunctions")
```
